title: Mirror image
descr: Make a combinator T that swaps its two arguments, that is, (x, y) → y x

title: But just you wait...
descr: Don't take the argument just yet, let it take what comes after it first.
A.K.A. the B combinator: f g x → f(g(x))

title: Lost at GoF, found at g∘f
descr: Somewhat similar to the previous one but you have to apply the functions in reverse order:

title: What you like, do once more!
descr: The W combinator is defined as x ⇒ y ⇒ x(y)(y). Implement it.

title: K forte
descr: Sometimes returning x for any given y is not enough.

title: Juggle juggle
descr: The C combinator: x → y → z → x z y.
